name: The Watchers: DEVOUR
description:
The Watchers: DEVOUR is a co-op horror survival game for 1-4 players. Players must explore the home of cult leader Anna Puerta and work together to burn ritual objects, escape the wrath of a possessed mother, and banish evil for good. Run. Scream. Hide. Just don't get caught.KEY FEATURESSingle player mode:
For hardcore players only. Have you got nerves of steel? In this mode you'll be doing all the work yourself.
2-4 player online co-op gameplay:
Take control of 4 cult members in this unique online co-op gaming experience. The Watchers: DEVOUR will test your communication and cooperation skills to the limit. Bring friends, or find other players using the server browser.
Horror atmosphere:
Includes haunting original music from established British composer, Peter Fender.STORYCalifornia, June 2006. Anna Puerta, leader of demonic cult The Watchers of Azazel, has just performed a forbidden ritual, believing she can summon and control the goat demon himself.
But something has gone wrong, and Azazel has possessed her. Anna's four most trusted cult members, realising what has happened, must now do everything in their power to stop her.The WatchersPlay as Anna's children Luisa and Frederico as they search for their mother in online co op sequel The Watchers.
